Duration.description: Specifies the duration over which the workload performance advisor is computed.
Duration.longDescription: The value shall specify the duration over which the workload performance advisor is computed.  The value shall conform to the Duration format.

WorkloadCharacteristics.description: Specifies a list of Workload Characteristics for metrics.

MetricId.longDescription: This property shall indicate id of the metric.Please refer to MetricDefination schema file for more information.

MetricValue.description: The workload utilization of the metric.
MetricValue.longDescription: This property shall indicate workload utilization of the metric calculated for specific duration mentioned in Duration property.

WorkloadCharacteristics.longDescription: The property shall specify a list of Workload Characteristics for metrics.

PerformanceTuningOption.description: Specifies a list of bios attribute settings with recommended values as part of workload performance advisor.

BIOSAttributeName.description: The attribute name of the BIOS settings.
BIOSAttributeName.longDescription: This property shall indicate attribute name of the BIOS Settings. Please refer to BIOS attribute registry schema for more information.

RecommendedValue.description: Recommended value for the corresponding BIOS attribute. Please refer to BIOS attribute registry schema for more information.
RecommendedValue.longDescription: Recommended value for the corresponding BIOS setting calculated for specific duration mentioned in DurationInMin property.

PerformanceTuningOption.longDescription: The property shall specify a list of Workload Characteristics for metrics.

title: #HpeWorkloadPerformanceAdvisor.v1_0_0.HpeWorkloadPerformanceAdvisor
